##Protein Plot

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot(subgroup$StudyDayNo,subgroup$PROT,type = "b", col = "red", xlab = "Day", ylab = "Prot Amount",main = "Protein Intake")

ggplot(subgroup, aes(x=factor(StudyDayNo), y=PROT)) + stat_summary(fun.y="mean", geom="bar")
```
